email_body: I have been riding my bike to work a couple of times each week and lifting with Matt. I thought you came in later. -----Original Message----- From: Landry, Chad Sent: Wednesday, August 22, 2001 11:22 AM To: Allen, Phillip K. Subject: are you still working out in the mornings? i cannot find anyone to lift in the mornings. let me know if you have been hitting it solo and could use a good spotter. i finally got a bike rack put on my car. gonna try and hit memorial this weekend. have you been lately? ckl
